Text: Picture looks great, but there is no sound. Any ideas for me?
Sound is good on my end. Did you try VLC?

Great quality for such an old movie. Thank you so very much for posting it. I saw this when I was in about 4th grade and I -loved- it! But it's old and kinda obscure so I never thought I'd find it online. But here it is. I was so surprised! I love this little short story. Thank you!  =)
